title: Are there any books on whether to divorce or not (for husbands)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Life’s not a choose-your-own ending adventure. There is no guide book. You have to decide for yourself whether staying and trying to make it work is better or worse than divorcing. It’s so dependent on your situation it’s not possible for a book to tell you what to do. Paul (I decided to divorce and it worked out well - I’m happily remarried. But that has almost no relevance to your situation).
